// Semi-transparent shadow on pillar inside church (turn on lantern or flashlight)
// Seems to be another shadow on the ground nearby which is slightly misaligned
// from some angles.

//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float4x4 LocalToWorld;
//   float4x4 ViewProjectionMatrix;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   ViewProjectionMatrix c0       4
//   LocalToWorld         c6       4
//

    vs_3_0
    def c4, 0, 0, 0, 0
    dcl_position v0
    dcl_color1 v1
    dcl_color o0
    dcl_texcoord o1
    dcl_texcoord5 o2
    dcl_position o3

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s3

    mov o0, v1
    mov o1, c4.x
    mul r0, c7, v0.y
    mad r0, c6, v0.x, r0
    mad r0, c8, v0.z, r0
    mad r0, c9, v0.w, r0
    mul r1, r0.y, c1
    mad r1, c0, r0.x, r1
    mad r1, c2, r0.z, r1
    mad r0, c3, r0.w, r1
    mov r3, r0
    mov o3, r0

// approximately 12 instruction slots used

// Output adjustment inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -i -f --stereo-sampler-vs=s3 --adjust=texcoord5 --git VertexShader_67_CRC32_8566F7CA.txt
texldl r2, c220.z, s3
add r2.w, r3.w, -r2.y
mad r3.x, r2.w, r2.x, r3.x
mov o2, r3
